name: Bengal Tiger
habitat: Forests of India, and Other parts of asia
food: Bengal Tigers are carnivors. They eat small mammals,  pacaderms, and rodents

name: Mantis Shrimp
habitat: Shallow waters of the Indian and Pacific Oceans
food: Manits Shrimp eat different worms and small fish
fun-fact: Mantis shrimps have the most complex eyes in the animal kingdom that can see ultraviolet and polarized light. They have trinocular vision which means that they can see one objects using one of the three different parts of eye.

name: Aye Aye
food: They eat insects fruits and flowers
fun-fact: they can see in the night

name: Ogre Spider
food: they eat bugs and small rodents
fun-fact: they use their web to catch their prey
